page.title: 09Mobile Home Park-Dorking NE
page.content: There is an area on the top of Box Hill where there are{six permanent {caravan sites}.One of them has 106 caravans(or mobile homes or units) all of which are connected to{main {drainage and electricity}.They are centrally heated. The units are like flat bungalows with{small gardens}which were mostly very well looked after.There was 20 foot between each caravan for safety.Car parking spaces are also provided.{Retired people,families and {young people}live on the site. Cats,mice and parrots are allowed but no dogs. We met the{manager}in the office, which was not very organised.He was a cheerful,unshaven,humorous man,dressed in a T_shirt and flared trousers. His wife wore carpet slippers.
